issues.title: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
issues.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.82 (foreground color: #d68910, background color: #ffffff, font size: 18.0pt (24px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 3:1

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.82:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #d0830a.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.82:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #d0830a.
original_issue.selector: html > body > main > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(2) > span

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.82:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #d0830a.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 3:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.82:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #d0830a.
original_issue.selector: html > body > main > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(3) > span

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. [Learn how to provide sufficient color contrast](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/color-contrast).
